item.title: US-89 South - Exits 396 and 395
item.description: US-89 south at Exit 396 - UT-106/Shepard Lane. Approaching Exit 395 - UT-225/To I-15 North/Park Lane/Lagoon. On the left is a sign showing that trucks are prohibited on Legacy Parkway.

item.title: US-89 South - Exits 397, 396, and 394

item.title: US-89 South - Exits 397 and 396
item.description: US-89 south approaching Exit 397 - UT-273/Farmington/Kaysville. Approaching Exit 396 - UT-106/Shepard Lane.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 316
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 316 - UT-68/500 South. Approaching Exit 317 - UT-106 East/400 North.
